import React from 'react' import './App.css'; class App extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { name: '', email: '', cpf: 0, adress: '', city: '', state: '', house: false, apt: false, curriculum: '', job: '', jobDescription: '', } } upperCase = (e) => { const { value } = e.target this.setState({ name: value.toUpperCase() }) } removeSpecial = (e) => { const { value } = e.target this.setState({ adress: value.replace(/[^a-zA-Zs]/g, "") }) } onBlurCheck = (e) => { let { name } = e.target; if (name === 'city') { e.target.value = e.target.value.match(/^\d/) ? '' : e.target.value; } } render() { return (
Dados Pessoais
Dados do seu último emprego
) } } export default App;
